item.title: git rebase with upstream fork
item.description: This post details the instructions to sync forked repo with upstream. Steps to rebase Add original repo to fork as upstream git remote add upstream https://link/to/original/repo.git Fetch master (or main) from upstream git fetch upstream master Rebase current branch with upstream master git rebase upstream/master Force push to remote git push --force
